title: HELP about custom players leaderboard
body:
Hello, i`m asking for help.
My idea is to do only my country players realtime ELO leaderboard table, like op.gg and other lol statistics websites have, but i want to include only custom players - i mean only my country players. I know that I would need to add players manualy and i have no problem with that.
So i`m asking for help, maybe someone know how to, know some tips or something, is this even possible? give me some directions from where I could start. Maybe is not so hard to do it and someone could help me with this? I know that it needs API, but i dont know how to use it all. Thank you for the answers

replies.body:
Signing up for [API access](https://developer.riotgames.com/) is a good starting place, along with visiting the [development boards](https://developer.riotgames.com/discussion/index). There should be a wealth of information to be found there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
